benchmark_details.name: PET-BENCH
benchmark_details.overview: PET-BENCH is a dedicated benchmark that evaluates LLMs across both self-interaction and human-interaction dimensions, emphasizing self-evolution and developmental behaviors alongside interactive engagement.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess performance of LLMs as E-pets on social network services.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: PET-BENCH may not fully capture the complexity of real-world human-pet interactions.

data.source: Simulation of realistic pet-owner interactions, covering dialogues, emotional expressions, routine activities.
data.annotation: Crowdsourced and reviewed by experts for quality and relevance.

methodology.calculation: Calculated based on evaluation of conversation quality and relevance to tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better simulation of pet interactions and emotional responses.
methodology.validation: Validation by experts across multiple iterations to ensure accuracy.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data anonymization practices followed to protect participant privacy.
